m:MaterialTitle.title: Raised
m:MaterialTitle.description: The raised button is a standard button that signify actions and seek to give depth to a mostly flat page.

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialButton text="Button" waves="DEFAULT" backgroundColor="white" textColor="black"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Primary" waves="LIGHT" backgroundColor="blue" textColor="white" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Disabled" waves="LIGHT" backgroundColor="blue" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="RIGHT" enabled="false"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Warn" waves="LIGHT" backgroundColor="red" textColor="white" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="RIGHT"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Icon Color" waves="RED" backgroundColor="white" textColor="black" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="RIGHT" iconColor="red"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Floating
m:MaterialTitle.description: The floating circular action button is meant for very important functions.

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" waves="LIGHT" size="LARGE" backgroundColor="red" iconType="cake" />
<m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" waves="LIGHT" size="LARGE" backgroundColor="blue" iconType="android" />
<m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" waves="LIGHT" size="LARGE" backgroundColor="blue" iconType="message" enabled="false"/>
<m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" waves="LIGHT" size="LARGE" backgroundColor="blue" iconType="group" />
<m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" waves="LIGHT" size="" backgroundColor="red" iconType="cake" />
<m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" waves="DEFAULT" size="" backgroundColor="white" iconColor="green" iconType="android" />

m:MaterialTitle.title: FLAT
m:MaterialTitle.description: Flat buttons are usually used within elements that already have depth like cards or modals.

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialButton text="Button" textColor="black" type="FLAT" waves="DEFAULT" />
<m:MaterialButton text="Primary (No Waves)" textColor="blue" type="FLAT" />
<m:MaterialButton text="Disabled" type="FLAT" waves="DEFAULT" enabled="false" />
<m:MaterialButton text="Warn" textColor="red" type="FLAT" waves="RED" />

m:MaterialTitle.title: Large
m:MaterialTitle.description: This button has a larger height for buttons that need more attention.

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialButton text="Button" waves="LIGHT" backgroundColor="blue" size="LARGE"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Button" waves="LIGHT" backgroundColor="blue" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT" size="LARGE"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Button" waves="LIGHT" backgroundColor="blue" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="RIGHT" size="LARGE"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Icon Button
m:MaterialTitle.description: Using MaterialIcon component extends ButtonBased which has predefined click events and functionalities

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialIcon iconType="menu" iconColor="blue" waves="DEFAULT"/>
<m:MaterialIcon iconType="favorite" iconColor="red" waves="DEFAULT" enabled="false"/>
<m:MaterialIcon iconType="MORE_VERT" iconColor="grey" waves="DEFAULT"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Disabled
m:MaterialTitle.description: When you set disabled='true' All events will be disabled.

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialButton text="Button" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT" size="LARGE" enabled="false"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Button" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT" enabled="false"/>
<m:MaterialButton text="Button" type="FLAT" enabled="false"/>
<m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" iconType="POLYMER" enabled="false"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Events
m:MaterialTitle.description: MaterialButtons , MaterialIcons and MaterialLinks extends ButtonBase which implements all Mouse Handlers, Click Handlers and other events.

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialButton ui:field="btnClick" text="Click Me" waves="LIGHT" backgroundColor="blue" textColor="white" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT"/>
<m:MaterialButton ui:field="btnHover" text="Hover Me" waves="LIGHT" backgroundColor="blue" textColor="white" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT"/>
<m:MaterialButton ui:field="btnDoubleClick" text="Double Click Me" waves="LIGHT" backgroundColor="blue" textColor="white" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Fixed Action Button
m:MaterialTitle.description: If you want a fixed floating action button, you can add multiple actions that will appear on hover. Our demo is in the bottom righthand corner of the page.

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialFloatingContainer> <m:initial><m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" waves="LIGHT" backgroundColor="blue" iconType="POLYMER"/></m:initial>
<m:item><m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" waves="LIGHT" backgroundColor="green" iconType="POLYMER"/></m:item>
<m:item><m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" waves="LIGHT" backgroundColor="red" iconType="POLYMER"/></m:item>
<m:item><m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" waves="LIGHT" backgroundColor="orange" iconType="POLYMER"/></m:item>
<m:item><m:MaterialButton type="FLOATING" waves="LIGHT" backgroundColor="blue" iconType="POLYMER"/></m:item>
</m:MaterialFloatingContainer>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Links
m:MaterialTitle.description: Using Material Link you can easily add href functionality into your app for navigation

g:HTMLPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialLink href="#normal" text="Normal Link" textColor="red" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT" grid=" "/>
<m:MaterialLink href="#material" text="Link with Href" textColor="red" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT" grid=" "/>
<m:MaterialLink href="#design" text="Link with Different Icon color" textColor="black" iconType="POLYMER" iconPosition="LEFT" iconColor="red" grid=" "/>
